original: 益州建寧人，蜀漢官員，李恢姑丈。曾為建寧令，因犯事而免官。後於諸葛亮南征時歸順蜀漢，官至偏將軍、領軍。
text: Yizhou Jianning native, Shuhan official, Uncle Li Hui. He was a Jianning order and was dismissed for committing a crime. Later, he returned to Shu Han during Zhuge Liang's southern expedition, and was an official general and leader.
